caption: A dreamy shoegaze track with walls of distorted guitars, ethereal reverb-drenched vocals, and hypnotic drum patterns. Features lush layered textures, tremolo effects, and a wash of sound that creates an immersive sonic landscape.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Drifting through a haze of sound
Feet not touching the ground
Colors bleeding into one
Chasing shadows of the sun

[Verse 2]
Your voice echoes in my head
Words that never could be said
Fading like a photograph
Memories cut in half

[Chorus]
Lost in waves of noise
Searching for your voice
Everything dissolves
Into the void

[Verse 3]
Time moves slow then fast
Nothing ever lasts
Beauty in decay
Washing all away

[Chorus]
Lost in waves of noise
Searching for your voice
Everything dissolves
Into the void

[Outro]

Into the void
Into the void
